Classes in org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.storage used by org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
RemoteStorageProvisioningDriverAdapter
           
 

Classes in org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.storage used by org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.storage
StorageProvisioningDriver
          This interface provides an entry point to provision block storage devices and attach them to specific compute instances nodes created by the ProvisioningDriver .
StorageProvisioningException
          Dedicated exception for storage provisioning errors.
VolumeDetails
          Describes a Block Storage Volume started by the StorageProvisioningDriver.
